data.actual_result: you can see all vc(s), including ones hidden from you. Additionally, if the vc does not specifically deny you or a role you are in from connecting, you may join the vc, as well as move others into it
data.expected_result: you should only see the vc(s) that you have access to
data.short_description: Short description: able to see and join hidden vcs
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a server with "move members" permission along with one vc you can join and one that is hidden from you- Join a vc - Long press yourself in the vc and attempt to move yourself to another vc
